title: Former Senator Ben Nelson (D-NE), "Death of the Senate"
description:
Former U.S. Senator Ben Nelson (D-NE) discusses the decline of bipartisanship in the Senate and offers recommendations to restore it in the chamber. He's interviewed by Senator Ben Sasse (R-NE).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
